hello.text: I haven't slept in days. Or nights, for the matter.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: I just told you. I've been clawing at my fur for ages but it still bites.

what.name: What happened recently ?
what.text: I've been hunting in farms near the human village. Last time I slept was there, in a haystack

check.name: Check out her skin
check.text: {i}You notice packs of skin without fur, as well as a few bugs here and there.{s}

prosthesis.name: Give her a cone
prosthesis.text: This cone should avoid her scratching too much, but she looks annoyed at the idea

prosthesis.name: Give her a prosthesis
prosthesis.text: {i}You lose precious time making plans for a useless contraption. It looks like her state has worsen meanwhile...{s}

medicine.name: Give her a vermifuge
medicine.text: Ah, thank you. I can already hear them stop bugging me.

medicine.name: Give her some coffee
medicine.text: You give her some coffee to wake her up. Now she isn't drowsy anymore.
